definition: Yandang mountains, famous scenic area in southeast Zhejiang
wild goose
variant of 雁[yan4]
to wash/to squander/to sweep away/to move/to shake/dissolute/pond
variant of 蕩|荡[dang4]
variant of 燙|烫[tang4]/variant of 趟[tang4]

mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable

sentences.english: Yeah, it reminds me of the Huge Dragon Waterfall of the Yandang Mountains.
sentences.chinese: 是啊，这里倒是让我想起了雁荡山的大龙湫。

sentences.english: Da Long Pool is well known in the world and is the most beautiful one in Yan Dang Mountain.
sentences.chinese: 大龙湫瀑布举世闻名，是雁荡山泉瀑流水之最。

sentences.english: The Factory is Loated in Hongqiao Town at the foot of Yandang mountain.
sentences.chinese: 我厂位于景色秀丽的旅游胜地雁荡山傍。

sentences.english: The transportation is very convenient, is a wild goose to concuss mountain 1 three star class the tour concern foreign affairs a hotel.
sentences.chinese: 交通十分便利，是雁荡山一家三星级旅游涉外饭店。

sentences.english: Yandang Mountain is famous for its screen-like peaks, caves and waterfalls.
sentences.chinese: 雁荡山因其屏障般的山峰，洞穴，和瀑布而闻名。

sentences.english: Hezhang Peak is one of Mt .
sentences.chinese: 合掌峰是雁荡山的代表景观之一。

sentences.english: They were debating whether to go to the Mount Putuo or the Mount Yandang just now.
sentences.chinese: 刚才他们在辩论是到普陀山去还是到雁荡山去。
